alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 08 at 1:55PM PST until March 12 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM PST THURSDAY TO 10 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected Thursday into Sunday. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 70 to 80 mph. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada Counties including Interstate 80 over Donner Pass and Highway 50 over Echo Summit. * WHEN...From 10 AM PST Thursday to 10 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
